description: Easy Indian spiced Eggplants and Potatoes. Aloo Baingan Recipe. Curried Potato Eggplant side. Serve with flatbread/rice and Dal. Vegan gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free.
name: Aloo Baingan Recipe Curried Potato Eggplant
recipeIngredient: 1 medium eggplant (chopped small, or 8 or more small eggplants, quartered)
1 large tomato (crushed, finely chopped or about 1 cup diced canned tomato)
cayenne (pure red chili powder or garam masala to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. When hot, add cumin and mustard seeds and cook them until cumin seeds change color and get fragrant. A few seconds or a minute depending on how hot the plan and oil are.
Add curry leaves carefully. Add garlic ginger and chili and cook for a minute or until the garlic is golden.
Add the coriander powder and turmeric and mix in. Add potatoes and eggplants and mix in.

Add the tomatoes, salt and water and mix in. Cover and cook for 15 minutes. Stir, reduce heat to medium-low and continue to cook until the eggplants and potatoes are tender to preference. about 15 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and spice and mix in.
Garnish with a good sprinkle of cayenne or garam masala or both, and cilantro and serve.

video.description:
Easy Potato Eggplant Curry - Aloo Baingan. 
Full Recipe here :-- http://www.veganricha.com/2016/01/aloo-baingan-recipe.html

1 Pot Indian Spiced Curried Eggplants and Potatoes. Serve with rice or flatbread, or make a wrap or a bowl with Dal. Add chickpeas to make it a meal.
